short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show WordPress.org profiles for users on GitHub.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds WordPress.org profile badges for users on GitHub, making it very easy to find WordPress contributors on WordPress.org if they use different usernames on the two platforms.
